quiz.ques: Which of the following methods is used to access HTML elements using Javascript?
quiz.details: Both the above methods are used to access HTML elements using Javascript

quiz.ques: When the switch statement matches the expression with the given labels, how is the comparison done?
quiz.a: Both the datatype and the result of the expression are compared
quiz.b: only the datatype of the expression is  compared
quiz.c: only the value of the expression is compared
quiz.details: Switch performs an ‘===’ based comparison, i.e both the value of the expression and its datatype is compared.

quiz.ques: What is the use of the <noscript> tag in Javascript?
quiz.a: The contents are displayed by non-JS-based browsers
quiz.b: Clears aa the cookies and cache
quiz.details: The <noscript> tag is displayed by non-Javascript browsers only.

quiz.ques: When an operator’s value is NULL, the typeof returned by the unary operator is:
quiz.details: Any NULL value of operator will always return typeof object.

quiz.ques: What does the Javascript “debugger” statement do?
quiz.a: It will debug all the errors in the program at runtime
quiz.b: It acts a breakpoint in a program
quiz.c: It will debug error in the current statement if any
quiz.details: ‘debugger’ statement is used to setup the breakup points at probable points of error in the code snippet, using the debugger window.
